Footer.tagline: Crafting timeless spaces with luxury and precision in the heart of London.

About.title: Defining the Art of Living
About.description_1: ZARDI is a premier architectural and interior design firm based in the heart of London. We specialize in creating high-end, bespoke spaces that reflect the unique personality and lifestyle of our clients.
About.description_2: With years of experience in luxury fit-outs and refurbishments, our team brings a meticulous eye for detail and a commitment to excellence to every project we undertake.

ServicesPage.title: Our Expertise
ServicesPage.subtitle: Elevating interiors through innovative design and expert craftsmanship.
ServicesPage.quality_desc: We use only the finest materials sourced from premium suppliers across Europe.
ServicesPage.execution_desc: Our management team ensures every detail is perfect, from planning to the final touch.
ServicesPage.bespoke_desc: Every space is a unique masterpiece tailored to your exact needs and vision.

ProjectsPage.title: Our Portfolio
ProjectsPage.coming_soon: Our recent projects are being curated for display. Check back soon for our latest work.

ContactPage.title: Let's Talk
ContactPage.subtitle: Ready to transform your space? Get in touch with our team of experts in London.
